i-feat-desc: The future is now. The perfect time to turn your ideas into reality.
i-feat-p0: Hi, I'm David Romero, I develop applications and services for multiple purposes with more than 7 years of experience in the area.
i-feat-p1: Feel free to take a look at my recent projects. If you like, you can leave a message, it will be a pleasure to assist you.
swipe-down: Slide down to see more information
h-contact-p: I will be happy to assist you, I will answer your questions as soon as possible.
h-summary-p: Download the curriculum summary by clicking on the option below
p-feat-desc: Analyze, test, collaborate with the projects available in this section.
p-feat-p0: Learn more details and access the source code through public repositories available to the community.
p-feat-p1: Keep in mind that some of these may be in the early stages of development. They may require additional work.
p-pr-desc: See below the catalogue of projects created.
a-feat-p1: I am passionate about <programming/> as a resource to build the future of tomorrow, using technology as the ideal complement to achieve new goals as society.
a-feat-p2: Born in the city of Ejido, Merida. Graduated at the Universidad de Falcon, with a degree in Electronic Engineering (Telecommunications).
a-s0-p0: I'm in constant search of new knowledge and challenges to transform them in motivation and impulse towards the use of new technologies and the development of better quality solutions.
a-s0-p2-s4: The outdoors is also well appreciated
a-s0-p3: Talk about community! In a world so interconnected, I consider it an honor to be able to share knowledge with colleagues on a global scale. I am passionate about collaboration on Open Source projects and often take time to answer questions and participate in discussions through communities like the Popular StackOverflow.
a-s1-p0: Under the premise of Full Stack Development, I have collaborated with wonderful teams under remote mode for the construction of complete solutions tailored to customer requirements.
a-s1-p1: For over five years I have worked in the field of Freelancing, having the opportunity to have direct interaction with the client for the development of solutions, from the taking of requirements, to the delivery and deployment of a minimum product that brings response to their needs.
a-s1-p2: Likewise, in the professional field, teamwork and project management are my passion. Where, through a global vision and appropriate agile methodology, each member contributes in an integral way: Dedication, knowledge and effort. Block by block until the delivery of feasible results, which project the talent and vision that represents us ðŸŒŸ
a-s2-p0: Like the builder, the developers have tools, which define much of the profile of quality and dedication applied in their projects.
a-s2-p1-s0: Scripting under Python, Bash y Batch
a-s2-p2-s0-i0: Websites under CMS, static and modern web applications
a-s2-p2-s0-i1: CMS and Other stacks: Wordpress, Webflow, Gatsby
a-s2-p2-s3-i0: Professional desktop applications with cross-platform support
a-s2-p2-s4-i0: Deployment and management of solutions in Cloud Computing platforms.
a-s2-p2-s5-i0: Development of games, simulations and interactive scenarios.

com.gk.medidores.name: Meter Registration
com.gk.medidores.description: A native application developed under Android for the management of electrical measurements. Includes location, image and basic metadata (address, reader code and measurement)

features.title: Capture locally
features.description: Register and store. Use as a foundation for the development of integration features tailored to your requirements.

features.title: Location registration
features.description: Capture coordinates from your location with ease. The data obtained is presented to the user through direct integration with Google Maps.

features.title: Reference image
features.description: Associate your measurement with a photograph, optionally, you will be assigned a random color in order to distinguish the records in the service.

features.title: Easy to use
features.description: Navigate through a simple and intuitive interface, with integration of updated support libraries and ready to use as a foundation for future solutions.

com.geekzolanos.agile.name: Agile Launcher
com.geekzolanos.agile.description: A launcher designed for low resource devices that seeks a fluid performance, providing a modern and pleasant appearance.

features.title: Easy to use
features.description: With a distinctive interface. Agile Launcher is easy to use, with no learning curve or complex tutorials. You'll be able to use its full potential right from the start.

features.title: Lightweight
features.description: The launcher has been developed with a focus on backward compatibility support. Thanks to this, its operation has been successfully tested on Android 4.x devices with a minimum of 256 MB.

features.title: Intuitive
features.description: Set up gestures to start applications without browsing lists, anchor applications to Quick Access, quickly access your device settings and customize your device.

features.title: Information at your fingertips
features.description: Get immediate information about the weather, time and date of your region. Quickly access advanced information associated with your installed applications, without complex procedures.

com.geekzolanos.gedcom.name: Gedcom Converter
com.geekzolanos.gedcom.description: An application developed in Electron to convert GEDCOM files to format, with implementation of a basic template system.

features.title: Quickly
features.description: Convert large GEDCOM files quickly and easily, with excellent content support and easy customization.

features.title: Multiplatform
features.description: Developed under the popular multi-platform Electron Framework. Gedcom Converter can be easily ported to the most popular operating systems on the market.

features.title: Customizable
features.description: Add a content index, modify the template used for content generation and customize the results to your requirements.

features.title: Google Adsense Support
features.description: Without technical knowledge, just specify the Snippet provided by the service and it will be automatically integrated for you.

org.umaven.web.name: UMAVEN
org.umaven.web.description: Official website of UMAVEN: One Hand for Venezuela and the World.

features.title: Optimized for mobile phones
features.description: Responsive, compatible design, optimized for mid-range and higher end devices

features.title: Online Store
features.description: Access a virtual store, where you can buy products of excellent quality and thus contribute your grain of sand for our cause.

features.title: Complete management
features.description: Advice and implementation of CMS for management by the team. Automatic updates and security notifications.

features.title: Fast loading
features.description: Optimized resources for optimized site loading, providing a pleasant experience for the end user.

features.title: Complete, Informative
features.description: Learn about the latest information associated with the foundation: Events, news, statutes, team information and more.

com.gk.aotf.name: Android For AOTF
com.gk.aotf.description: Custom build the popular operating system to support the first Firefox OS device on the market, the Alcatel One Touch Fire.
com.gk.aotf.shortDescription: Alternative ROM for the first FxOS device on the market

features.title: Android 4 support.
features.description: Based on the source code available in the CodeAurora repositories, the system operates under the Android 4.0 version (Ice Cream Sandwich)

features.title: Multiple Start
features.description: Easily switch between Firefox OS and Android on your device, alternating with the integrated option from your launcher.

features.title: Secure installation
features.description: Thanks to the design of the device and its SoC, you can perform the installation of the ROM without worrying about a permanent brick of the device.

features.title: Overclocking
features.description: Overclock your device to 1.4 GHz for use in applications requiring additional power.

features.title: Virtual Memory
features.description: Expand your device memory by using either Swap Memory in storage or MicroSD memory and enhance your overall usage experience.

com.gk.speedgps.name: SpeedGPS
com.gk.speedgps.description: PWA initially developed for the Firefox Marketplace. Check the current speed using geolocation techniques.
com.gk.speedgps.shortDescription: Check the current speed using geolocation techniques

features.title: Multiplatform
features.description: Supported by Apache Cordoba as a PWA, it can be used from your browser, as a desktop application or mobile device and more.

features.title: Easy to use
features.description: With a pleasant and fast interface, SpeedGPS provides the user with the ideal starting point to access all its functionalities.

features.title: Customizable
features.description: Specify conversion units, enable sound effects, notifications and vibration as needed.

features.title: Complete information
features.description: Access all the information available from the Geolocation services on your device, in real time, and in readable format.

org.ateneo.hdri.name: Ateneo de Punto Fijo
org.ateneo.hdri.description: A virtual 3D walk through the facilities of the Ateneo de Punto Fijo "RubÃ©n Ismael Padilla"
org.ateneo.hdri.shortDescription: A virtual 3D walk through the Web

features.title: Access to the facilities
features.description: The environments have been recreated with the aim of providing you with the most complete experience possible. Browse through the main building, the theater, and even spaces such as the parking lot and back garden.

features.title: Interactive
features.description: Get information at every stage of the tour, interact with paintings distributed in the facilities, get a pleasant experience with sound effects and more.

features.title: WebGL Support
features.description: Thanks to the development under the popular Unity3D engine, you can enjoy the experience through the comfort of your browser.

features.title: Support for low-end PCs
features.description: Step operation has been tested on low-end laptops and PCs, ensuring a pleasant experience for the end user.
